accounts.name: guardian_set
docs: Guardian set used for signature verification.

accounts.name: guardian_signatures
docs: Stores unverified guardian signatures as they are too large to fit in the instruction data.

accounts.name: stake_account_checkpoints
docs: CheckpointData and StakeAccountMetadata accounts are optional because
in order to be able to claim vests that have not been delegated

instructions.name: close_signatures
docs: Allows the initial payer to close the signature account in case the query was invalid.

instructions.name: create_stake_account
docs: Trustless instruction that creates a stake account for a user

accounts.name: custody_authority
docs: CHECK : This AccountInfo is safe because it's a checked PDA

accounts.name: custody_authority
docs: CHECK : This AccountInfo is safe because it's a checked PDA

instructions.name: recover_account
docs:
Recovers a user's `stake account` ownership by transferring ownership
     * from a token account to the `owner` of that token account.
     *
     * This functionality addresses the scenario where a user mistakenly
     * created a stake account using their token account address as the owner.

accounts.name: custody_authority
docs: CHECK : This AccountInfo is safe because it's a checked PDA

errors.name: InvalidGuardianIndexOutOfRange
errors.msg: Invalid guardian index out of range

types.name: CheckpointData
docs: CheckpointData account has a fixed header (owner, next_index)
and a dynamic tail where checkpoints are stored in byte format
This is designed to be able to dynamically extend the CheckpointData account up to 10Mb
This will save approximately 655,000 checkpoints into one account

fields.name: refund_recipient
docs: Payer of this guardian signatures account.
Only they may amend signatures.
Used for reimbursements upon cleanup.

fields.name: guardian_signatures
docs: Unverified guardian signatures.

types.name: StakeAccountMetadata
docs: This is the metadata account for each staker
It is derived from the checkpoints account with seeds "stake_metadata"
and the checkpoints account pubkey
It stores some PDA bumps, owner and delegate accounts

types.name: VestingBalance
docs: Used to store the total vesting balance of a single vester
It is also used to delegate vesting

fields.name: index
docs: Index representing an incrementing version number for this guardian set.

fields.name: keys
docs: Ethereum-style public keys.

fields.name: creation_time
docs: Timestamp representing the time this guardian became active.

fields.name: expiration_time
docs: Expiration time when VAAs issued by this set are no longer valid.
